meanings.definition: A family of venomous snakes known for their hollow, fixed fangs.
meanings.sent1: Elapids are dangerous snakes with venomous fangs.
meanings.sent2: The elapids in the zoo are kept in secure enclosures.
meanings.sent3: The elapids decided to have a fang fashion show.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as sharp as the elapids' fangs.
meanings.sent5: The elapids' fangs gleamed in the moonlight, ready to strike.

meanings.definition: Any snake belonging to the family Elapidae.
meanings.sent1: I saw an elapids slithering through the grass.
meanings.sent2: Elapids are fascinating creatures to study.
meanings.sent3: The elapids threw a surprise party for the other snakes.
meanings.sent4: His words were as venomous as an elapids' bite.
meanings.sent5: The elapids' colors shimmered in the sunlight, blending with the surroundings.
